Slave01.SlaveConnection: ipv4 address or the serial port name to Modbus device
Slave01.TcpPort: tcp port of Modbus connection, default is 502
Slave01.HwId: unique HW Id defined by user
Slave01.BaudRate: baud rate of serial communication (Modbus RTU only)
Slave01.DataBits: data bits of serial communication (Modbus RTU only)
Slave01.StopBits: stop bits of serial communication (Modbus RTU only)
Slave01.Parity: parity of serial communication (Modbus RTU only)
Slave01.FlowControl: flow control of serial communication (Modbus RTU only)
